subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The success of Oudin, who reached the U.S. Open quarterfinals in 2009 when she was just 17, loomed again with the sensation caused by the 15-year-old Bellis.
snippet: The success of Oudin, who reached the U.S. Open quarterfinals in 2009 when she was just 17, loomed again with the sensation caused by the 15-year-old Bellis.
